analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/10/0xdb5c3c46e28b53a39c255aa39a411dd64e5fed9c.sol:
	Contract NeosCredits has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/10/0xdb5c3c46e28b53a39c255aa39a411dd64e5fed9c.sol#214)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/10/0xdb5c3c46e28b53a39c255aa39a411dd64e5fed9c.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/10/0xdb5c3c46e28b53a39c255aa39a411dd64e5fed9c.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/10/0xdb5c3c46e28b53a39c255aa39a411dd64e5fed9c.sol#84) is not in mixedCase
